ResourceHeader.Description: The magnetometer at the THEMIS/Sanikiluaq station. SNKQ is part of the NRCan network. It records 3-axis magnetic field measurements at 2Hz frequency.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically I. Mann for use of the GMAG data, and the CSA for support of the CARISMA network.

InformationURL.Description: Web portal to access Canadian GBO & GMAG data.
